page.title: 09HILL TOP FARM - TACOLNESTON
page.content:
This pig breeding farm keeps 110 sows and sells small pigs for fattening at 30 kgs.The piglets are born in crates and then reared in multi_suckling houses,two litters living together. Weaning takes place at 5 weeks into warm kennels. Pigs are sold at about 10 weeks. The sows are kept in groups of 6 during pregnancy & are individ_ ually fed. All pigs are cleaned & given fresh straw every day. The whole unit is straw_based. Piglets are given an iron injection at 3 days & all adult stock are wormed by injection every six months.
The farm also has 100 stock geese, hatching the eggs & selling day_old goslings for the Christmas trade.
